name: MechPS
description:
My submission for the mech game jam 2.

control a mech suit fighting through the war torn street of and face challenging enemies such as: poorly made tank that menacingly rotates to face you, some strangely sized office chairs, and blue cars.

Enjoy?

This is a prototype of some unfinished things that I put together in my limited spare time. This is also my first game in unity. I have no current plans to continue with MechPS development.

the 4k chair is a joke. don't take it seriously
